meanings: shut[close] (one's mouth); (발설하지 않다) keep quiet, keep silent

vlive.korean: 입 다물고 있어 - 너네 존재 자체가 웃겨 뒤돌고 있어! Stop talking. - Your existence is funny! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.110
vlive.english: Stop talking. - Your existence is funny!

vlive.korean: 지금 입을 다물고 있는 유나초이. It's Yuna Choi who has sealed her mouth. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 🦊🐥
vlive.english: It's Yuna Choi who has sealed her mouth.

vlive.korean: 그래서 입을 꼭 다물고 있어야 돼요 입을 열면... 뭔지 아시죠? You have to close your mouth. If you open it, you know, right? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 덥모닝💕
vlive.english: You have to close your mouth. If you open it, you know, right?

vlive.korean: 첫 째, 입을 다물고, 공기를 머금고 5초간 계세요. No.1 Lightly close the mouth and puff up the cheeks with the air. Maintain for 5 seconds. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Why Do Korean Girls Look So Young? | Korean Anti Aging Skin Care Tips | Wishtrend TV
vlive.english: No.1 Lightly close the mouth and puff up the cheeks with the air. Maintain for 5 seconds.

vlive.korean: 한번 다물고 찍어볼까요? Should I try? 듣기 View video HOONION : [Makeup] Back to school makeup 봄맞이 개강남신 메이크업

examples.korean: Just shut up and listen! 발음듣기 그냥 입 다물고 들어 봐! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Just shut up and listen! 발음

examples.korean: She was told to keep her mouth shut and not rock the boat. 발음듣기 그녀는 평지풍파 일으키지 말고 입을 다물고 있으라는 말을 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was told to keep her mouth shut and not rock the boat. 발음

examples.korean: Her most annoying habit was eating with her mouth open. 발음듣기 가장 짜증스러운 그녀의 버릇은 입을 안 다물고 뭘 먹는 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her most annoying habit was eating with her mouth open. 발음

examples.korean: I'm glad I kept my mouth shut and didn't complain because it would have made me look unprofessional. 발음듣기 저는 입을 꾹 다물고 불평하지 않았던 것을 다행스럽게 생각합니다. 그랬다면 프로정신이 부족한 사람으로 보여졌을 테니까요. DARAKWON
examples.english: I'm glad I kept my mouth shut and didn't complain because it would have made me look unprofessional. 발음

examples.korean: If A is success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut. (Albert Einstein) 발음듣기 A가 인생의 성공이라면 A=x+y+z다. x는 일, y는 놀이, z는 입을 다물고 있는 것이다. (알버트 아인슈타인, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If A is success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut. (Albert Einstein) 발음
